products.name: Apple (iPhone)
products.title: iPhone 15 Pro
products.description: The ultimate iPhone experience. Forged in aerospace-grade titanium with a new customizable Action button, a powerful A17 Pro chip that enables next-level gaming and performance,and an advanced camera system for stunning photos and video.

products.name: Samsung
products.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
products.description: Unleash your creativity with the power of Galaxy AI. The S24 Ultra features a brilliant 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a built-in S Pen for precise note-taking, and a professional-grade quad camera system with a 200MP main sensor for incredible detail.

products.name: Google (Pixel)
products.title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
products.description: The smartest Pixel yet, powered by Google AI. It boasts the revolutionary Tensor G3 chip, an advanced camera system with pro-level controls, and the best-of-Google features like Call Screen and Magic Editor, all running on the clean, intuitive Android experience.

products.name: OnePlus
products.title: OnePlus 12
products.description: Never Settle for extraordinary performance. The OnePlus 12 is equipped with the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a Hasselblad-tuned camera for natural color science, and incredibly fast 100W wired charging, all wrapped in a sleek, premium design.

products.name: Xiaomi
products.title: Xiaomi 15
products.description: A photography masterclass in your pocket. Created in collaboration with Leica, this device features a state-of-the-art quad-camera array with a 1-inch-type main sensor, offering unparalleled versatility and image quality for mobile photographers.

products.name: OPPO
products.title: OPPO Find X7 Ultra
products.description: Pioneering the future of smartphone imaging with a dual periscope camera system. It offers powerful telephoto capabilities alongside a flagship Hasselblad-tuned main camera, all powered by a top-tier processor for seamless performance.

products.name: vivo
products.title: vivo X200 Pro
products.description: Redefining mobile portrait photography with ZEISS co-engineering. The X100 Pro features a large APO-style telephoto lens and the powerful MediaTek Dimensity 9300 chip, delivering stunning bokeh and exceptional performance in an elegant design.

products.name: Motorola
products.title: motorola edge 40 Neo
products.description: Style and substance that doesn't break the bank. This phone offers a gorgeous pOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a capable 50MP main camera with Optical Image Stabilization, and super-fast charging in a sleek, vegan leather design.

products.name: Nothing
products.title: Nothing Phone (2)
products.description: A unique blend of iconic design and sharp interface. The transparent Glyph Interface on the back allows for intuitive light-based notifications and controls, paired with a powerful Snapdragon chip and a clean, custom Android experience for a truly distinct flagship.

products.name: Huawei
products.title: HUAWEI P60 Pro
products.description: Celebrating aesthetics and imaging innovation. Renowned for its unique Rococo Pearl finish and ultra-bright, variable aperture camera system, the P60 Pro captures breathtaking light and detail in any condition, showcasing a truly artistic design philosophy.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
products.title: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Experience industry-leading noise cancellation for immersive sound. With 30-hour battery life, crystal-clear call quality, and ultra-comfortable design.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air (M3, 13-inch)
products.title: MacBook Air 13" (M3)
products.description: Supercharged by the M3 chip. Featuring a stunning Liquid Retina display, all-day battery life, and a silent, fanless design.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
products.title: Nintendo Switch - OLED Model
products.description: Play at home or on the go with a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and a wide adjustable stand.

products.name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
products.title: Dyson V15 Detect
products.description: Powerful suction with intelligent laser detection that reveals hidden dust. A piezoelectric sensor automatically adjusts suction.

products.name: Samsung Odyssey G9 Gaming Monitor
products.title: Samsung Odyssey G9
products.description: A massive 49-inch Dual QHD curved screen with a 240Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time for incredibly vivid and smooth gameplay.

products.name: Fujifilm X-T5 Mirrorless Camera
products.title: Fujifilm X-T5
products.description: A classic camera with modern power. Features a 40.2MP sensor, 6.2K video, and in-body image stabilization.

products.name: Amazon Echo Show 10 (3rd Gen)
products.title: Echo Show 10 (3rd Gen)
products.description: A smart display that moves with you. The 10.1" HD screen rotates to keep you on camera during video calls.

products.name: Logitech MX Keys Mini for Mac
products.title: MX Keys Mini for Mac
products.description: A compact, wireless keyboard with smart backlighting, perfect stroke keys, and multi-device pairing.

products.name: Canon PIXMA TR8620 All-in-One Printer
products.title: Canon PIXMA TR8620
products.description: A versatile home office printer. Print, scan, copy, and fax. Features automatic duplex printing and a 250-sheet paper capacity.

products.name: Anker 737 Power Bank (PowerCore 24K)
products.title: Anker 737 Power Bank
products.description: A giant 24,000mAh capacity with 140W output. Can charge a laptop, tablet, and phone simultaneously with a digital display.
